629490.name: Fantasy Grounds - Animals (Token Pack)
629490.description:
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game.
This token pack contains 53 tokens: This set covers a wide range of domesticated and wild animals.
This token pack includes:
  • Ape
  • Baboon
  • Badger
  • Badger, honey
  • Bat
  • Bear Black
  • Bear Brown
  • Bear Polar
  • Bison
  • Boar
  • Camel
  • Cat
  • Chicken
  • Cow
  • Crocodile
  • Crocodile, large
  • Dog
  • Dog, riding
  • Eagle
  • Goat
  • Hawk
  • Horse
  • Horse, Riding
  • Hyena
  • Leopard
  • Lion
  • Lizard
  • Manta Ray
  • Monkey
  • Mule
  • Octopus
  • Owl
  • Owl, Brown
  • Pig
  • Porpoise
  • Rat
  • Raven
  • Rhinoceros
  • Sea Lion
  • Sea Lion, cub
  • Shaggy Mountain Pony
  • Shaggy Pony, Riding
  • Shark
  • Snake, Constrictor
  • Squid
  • Tiger
  • Toad
  • Turtle, Sea
  • Weasel
  • Whale
  • Wolf
  • Wolverine
Fantasy Grounds Conversion:Doug Davison
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software. This product should work with all rulesets.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
